title: Renovated Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Near Grocery Stores
description:
The unfurnished studio apartment home at 2510 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view including a peak of South Philadelphia in between high-rise buildings. We plan to renovate this particular home. Be the first to enjoy new renovations! This renovated kitchen will be nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen will be fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. This home will have wood floors. Move into your new home as early as February 15, 2023!
All utilities, except for cable and internet, are included. You have your choice of cable and/or internet provider.
Our amenities are amazing! This community offers a sauna, package room, lounge, fitness center, fitness/yoga studio, dog spa, guest suites, and bicycle storage. Lounge 201 includes a pool table, media room, printer/copier, conference room, demonstration kitchen, dining area, and cozy seating areas. Plus, we are renovating our roof deck! There is a front door attendant and a front desk concierge. In this building, there is a laundry room on every floor. Plus, you may do multiple loads of laundry at the same time in our large laundry facility on the third floor. We have an attached parking garage! Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by this community, so the monthly parking fee is separate.
Nearby grocery stores and food markets are Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Traders Joe's, Giant, Di Bruno Bros., and the Reading Terminal Market.
Wondering if this home is still available for rent at the Rittenhouse Claridge? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2510 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term. 2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: Beautiful, bright and open condo available for rent!
description:
Beautiful, bright and open condo available for rent in the Tivoli building in the Art Museum Area. This condo is located on the second floor of the garden units, with no more units above. It offers 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, washer/dryer, GARAGE PARKING (negotiable) and is overlooking the central courtyard with pergolas and fountain. You can access to unit either via the main building/concierge or via the private courtyard gate. Walk into the open concept living/dinning/kitchen area that has plenty of space and a pantry. Both bedrooms are large with spacious closets and are overlooking Center City Skyline (South) receiving a great amount of day light. The unit offers soaring ceiling height and hardwood floors throughout. The building has 24 hour concierge, fitness center, playroom for kids and a conference room with a kitchen. Located in an unbeatable location within walking distance to Whole Foods, Target, Clemente Playground, Philadelphia Sports Club, the Barnes, Philadelphia Art Museums, The Franklin Institute, City Hall, Septa, the prestigious Julia R. Masterman School and so much more!
1900 Hamilton St #D16

title: Welcome home to Pier 3 Condominiums at Penn's Landing!
description:
Welcome home to Pier 3 Condominiums at Penn's Landing! This 2br/2ba 1300SF suns soaked unit on the Delaware River has amazing waterfront views and 1 car garage parking. The spacious open concept living room offers a wood-burning fireplace and direct access to the newly renovated kitchen. The owners suite has ample closet space, an en-suite bathroom, hardwood floors, and a private balcony facing the newly renovated atrium. You will love the second bedroom that has a spiral staircase to the bonus loft area which has significant amounts of extra living/bookshelf/storage space. In-unit washer/dryer. Pier 3 Condominiums at Penn's Landing provides the following on-site amenities: 24-hour concierge, heated indoor pool, fitness room, sun deck on the Delaware River, and relaxation lounge. This pet friendly building allows 2 animals up to 40 pounds each. Short walking distance to Spruce Street Harbor Park, Blue Cross RiverRink, Cherry Street Pier and Race Street Pier. Close to historical attractions including the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall, Independence Visitor Center, National Constitution Center, and Museum of the American Revolution. Unit comes fully furnished or unfurnished based on your preference.
3 N Columbus Blvd #TD442

title: Luxurious one bedroom plus den in The Wilson, a boutique apartment
description:
Luxurious one bedroom plus den in The Wilson, a boutique apartment building on the corner of 16th and Sansom Streets in the heart of Center City. The home features an open kitchen with island, custom countertops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances and modern cabinetry. The bathroom is appointed in designer finishes and has a modern vanity and large walk-in shower. Additional highlights include a flat-panel wall-mounted TV, washer/dryer, excellent closet space, oversized windows and wood-style plank tile floors. The Wilson has a secure entry system controllable by a panel in each unit and by each resident's smart phone. The building is wired for Comcast and residents pay electric, cable and Internet. Residents enjoy a central location less than 3 blocks from Rittenhouse Square, 2 blocks to the Market Street west office corridor, 2 blocks to The Avenue of the Arts, 1 block to Rittenhouse Row shopping and dining, and a plethora of restaurants and shops within close walking distance.

title: Enjoy space, luxury and convenience at the Ellington
description:
Enjoy space, luxury and convenience at the Ellington. This is one of the larger one bedroom floor plans in the building. The living and dining areas offer soaring ceiling heights, oversized windows, and gorgeous Brazilian cherry hardwood floors. The kitchen with breakfast bar is top of the line. POGGENPOHL cabinets are complemented by stainless steel appliances, KOHLER fixtures and CAPAO BONITO granite countertops. The bedroom is generously proportioned, and the spa-like bathroom boasts White GIOIA marble tile flooring, designer chrome fixtures and a ceramic sink with storage vanity. Rent includes central air and heating, water and sewer, a 24 hour concierge, on-site fitness center, and residents' lounge. Convenient valet parking is available adjacent to the building in a public garage for an additional fee. Live in the most prestigious and stylish of neighborhoods. Perfectly situated in the Rittenhouse and Avenue of the Arts area, this home is steps away from fine dining, one-of-a-kind shopping, world-renowned cultural destinations and exciting nightlife. The campuses of Penn and Drexel, 30th Street Station and major hospitals are all minutes away.

title: Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital
description:
Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital, situated amongst the dining and community gathering spaces that make this neighborhood one of Philly's most desireable, is a gorgeous 3 story brick-front townhome. An open floor plan and wide layout greets you as you enter this sophisticated, light-filled open concept living/dining space. The space enjoys an abundance of natural light owing to two west facing windows. The contemporary style pairs neutral walls with rich dark hardwood floors, and cabinetry, and shows off a grand white Quartz island with a striking waterfall feature. If a glamorous kitchen is what you’re looking for, you will be pleased with the newly renovated custom chef’s kitchen which is designed with generous storage space, specialized knife, spice and kitchen-tool drawers as well as hidden panel built-in garbage and recycling storage. If creating a welcoming space for family and visitors is your goal, the oversized island seats 5 comfortably and is perfect for entertaining or for casual family meals in the kitchen. Stainless steel appliances include a counter depth, side-by-side refrigerator, a 5-burner gas range, range hood and a dishwasher designed to disappear behind a cabinet panel. The second level of the home features wainscoting in the hallway along with two bedrooms plus a shared 3-piece bathroom. Both bedrooms are spacious and feature hardwood floors and ample closets. The hall bath features a tub/shower combo, plus a modern vanity, matching mirror and ample storage closet. The third floor is the primary suite level with an open plan to include a den/home office, perfect for working from home, or also perfect to finish as a nursery for a growing family. This room is also finished with wainscoting for a unique look. The bedroom area features high ceilings, hardwood floors, two windows, a large french door style double closet and an additional single closet with built-in shelving/storage. The private primary bathroom has a bathtub along with a separate stall shower, vanity and a third storage closet. Need more living space or a bonus room? The fully finished lower level is the perfect bonus space which can be used as a family room, exercise room, or additional guest space. It also features a convenient powder room. The home also has a rear patio, perfect for a bistro table and BBQ grill. Add some planters and enjoy your private city garden. With a WalkScore of 96, this home is within a short stroll to amazing Graduate Hospital destinations. It's located blocks from Julian Abel park, Chester Arthur School and a short walk from the many neighborhood restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and grocery stores. Easy access to public transportation, South Street, nearby Rittenhouse Square, and the Schuylkill River Trail. Sorry, no pets. No smoking.
759 S 22nd St

title: Garage and parking lot available, On site washer and dryer
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
